definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 5:16 searching, thing (to be) searched out;—abs. [[חֵ֫קֶר]] Job 5:9 + 8 t.; cstr. id. Job 8:8 + 2 t.; pl. cstr. [[חִקְרֵי]] Ju Jdg 5:16; —[[חִקְרֵי לֵב]] Ju Jdg 5:16 searchings, questionings of heart; Job 11:7 canst thou reach [[אֱלוֹהַּ]] ´[[ח]] i.e. what is to be explored in him, the whole range of his nature, so ´[[ח]] [[תהום]] Job 38:16 the range of the deep; esp. ´[[אֵין ח]] i.e. it is unsearchable Job 5:9, Job 9:10, Ps 145:3, Pr 25:3, Is 40:28, cf. ´[[לא ח]] Job 34:24, Job 36:26; [[אבותם]] ´[[ח]] Job 8:8 i.e. thing searched out by their fathers.
